responsibilities: Own and lead the design, development, and root cause analysis of a new segment of accelerated servers.
Work closely with customers to understand their technical needs and business goals.
Architect solutions for deployment at scale.
Collaborate with an interdisciplinary team of component, firmware, test, qualification, and integration engineers.
Lead design and manufacturing partners to bring servers to the data center.
Oversee the fleet of developed servers, monitoring their quality and customer requirements.
Interface with internal and external customers to understand project requirements and facilitate system development.
Learn operational challenges to improve current customer experience and develop improved systems for future designs.
Work directly with vendors and ODM/JDM design teams to develop and manufacture products at scale.
qualifications: Experience in design verification plans and functional test procedures.
Ability to work with interdisciplinary teams.
Strong communication skills to effectively and respectfully interact with employees, supervisors, and staff.
Ability to adhere to standards of excellence despite stressful conditions.
Ability to exercise sound judgment and manage stress effectively.
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on the design, development, and deployment of accelerated servers, which involves working with hardware and systems engineering. The tasks include root cause analysis, collaborating with interdisciplinary teams, and working with design and manufacturing partners. The skills required emphasize experience in developing functional specifications, design verification, and the ability to work with interdisciplinary teams. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The job seems to be more related to hardware and systems engineering rather than AI or language model development.
